text:
@PeteButtigieg @windmillcharger Moms book. She passed from COVID19. RIP
"Our president, ever so distrustful, seeing enemies all around him, tilts the windmills & attacks his imaginary enemies, as did Don Quixote’s main character & one of the greatest works of fiction ever published." https://t.co/LHoYK9J36c
